channel.title: PLEASE HELP, server problems
channel.description: Ok so about 2 days ago i downloaded a 562 server (after looking for 4 months!) i think, i dont know really but it is the DemoniaxScape one and anyhow at first i had a problem saying something about it could not find jvm but i started looking at how to fix that and i guess all i had to do was set variables :(. Anyhow so i set them and it worked but then when i started up the client it loads to where it says "connecting to Update Server" and it stops and about 10 seconds later on the little cmd box looking thing it says: error_game_js5connect and i am lost from there. I have been looking for how to fix it and theres nothing... :mad: So..............Can someone please help me?!?!

item.title: PLEASE HELP, server problems
item.dc:creator: @skullbandit1209 skullbandit1209
item.description:
@skullbandit1209 wrote:

[quote=“plowking321, post:8, topic:388714”]If you want to change what ever server it is trying to connect to then open your client folder, and open the src folder. Once you’ve done that open the client.java found in that folder.
Then Crtl + f:
Class131_Sub2_Sub7.aString5636
One you’ve found that you should see a server ip. Replace that with 127.0.0.1 for example:

You would change…
Class131_Sub2_Sub7.aString5636 = “(servername)”;

To…
Class131_Sub2_Sub7.aString5636 = “127.0.0.1”;

I hope you understand now :D[/quote]

Well yes actually i do understand a little bit better but when i ctrl+F it cannt find that stuff i even tried the other guys suggestion and it couldnt find that either im just gonna download the client again and see if that does anything i found this other server i might download instead it’s called demise pking v5 i think its a 317 it looks good im gonna do that instead of mess with the other one and see if it works but im not gonna delete the other one just yet

Read full topic

item.title: PLEASE HELP, server problems
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[s]I don’t know what to search for in a 508+. Search in your Client class and, if there’s a GUI/EGUI class, search for “server ip” or “ip” or “serverip” or “no-ip” or “127.0.0.1” or any other variation of an IP that you can.

You’ll just have to wait for someone to come along who knows more otherwise.[/s]

Read full topic

item.title: PLEASE HELP, server problems
item.dc:creator: @plowking321 plowking321
item.description:
@plowking321 wrote:

If you want to change what ever server it is trying to connect to then open your client folder, and open the src folder. Once you’ve done that open the client.java found in that folder.
Then Crtl + f:
Class131_Sub2_Sub7.aString5636
One you’ve found that you should see a server ip. Replace that with 127.0.0.1 for example:

You would change…
Class131_Sub2_Sub7.aString5636 = “(servername)”;

To…
Class131_Sub2_Sub7.aString5636 = “127.0.0.1”;

I hope you understand now

Read full topic

item.title: PLEASE HELP, server problems
item.dc:creator: @skullbandit1209 skullbandit1209
item.description:
@skullbandit1209 wrote:

Mendorphins:

No I don’t know a thing about 508 plus servers, and why does everyone want to do TeamViewer? You can solve these problems yourself by a few tips from people on the forums - then you learn a bit.

:mad:…i cant solve the problems because i prolly know less than you thats y i posted this…anyways so you dont know how to see what the ip of the client is then?

Read full topic

item.title: PLEASE HELP, server problems
item.dc:creator: @skullbandit1209 skullbandit1209
item.description:
@skullbandit1209 wrote:

Mendorphins:

127.0.0.1 is your local IP (localhost), also known as 0.0.0.0. You have to run the server first before running the client because the client is setup to connect to the server as an update server.

Ya i know i have been can we teamview or something because you know what your doing?

Read full topic

item.title: PLEASE HELP, server problems
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

127.0.0.1 is your local IP (localhost), also known as 0.0.0.0. You have to run the server first before running the client because the client is setup to connect to the server as an update server.

Read full topic

item.title: PLEASE HELP, server problems
item.dc:creator: @skullbandit1209 skullbandit1209
item.description:
@skullbandit1209 wrote:

plowking321:

either your not running the server or the client isn’t connecting to the 127.0.0.1 server.

Well im fairly new to this what do i need to do to see how to connect it to the 127 ip thingy?

Read full topic

item.title: PLEASE HELP, server problems
item.dc:creator: @skullbandit1209 skullbandit1209
item.description:
@skullbandit1209 wrote:

Ok so about 2 days ago i downloaded a 562 server (after looking for 4 months!) i think, i dont know really but it is the DemoniaxScape one and anyhow at first i had a problem saying something about it could not find jvm but i started looking at how to fix that and i guess all i had to do was set variables :(. Anyhow so i set them and it worked but then when i started up the client it loads to where it says “connecting to Update Server” and it stops and about 10 seconds later on the little cmd box looking thing it says: error_game_js5connect and i am lost from there. I have been looking for how to fix it and theres nothing… :mad:
So…Can someone please help me!!!
